div.id: Updates on Fulton County Facility closures and Service Change
div.aria-label: fulton-warning Updates on Fulton County Facility closures and Service Change
div.h5: Updates on Fulton County Facility closures and Service Change

p.a: Read the Latest on Fulton County Closures and Service Changes

div.p:
The health & safety of Fulton County residents is our top priority. Fulton County is working closely with the State of Georgia, the federal government, our 15 cities and our two school systems, and many other partners.
Learn more here about resources to assist people and businesses affected by COVID-19 in our community. Please check regularly for updates.
Here are the Fulton County Board of Health Declarations and Resolutions. Please click to read each.

p.strong: Click Here to read Governor Kemp's Executive Order issued on April 2, 2020
Click Here to read Governor Kemp's Shelter in Place Order
Click Here to read the Statewide Shelter in Place Order Handout
for the Wednesday, April 1, 2020 Board of Commissioners COVID-19 Response Update

div.h3: Fulton Commissioners to Hold Recess Meeting Virtually
div.div: The Fulton County Board of Commissioners will hold their April 2020 recess meeting via videoconference. Among the issues to be discussed is the County’s ongoing response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
